page.title: 19Public Transport/Darras hall
page.content:
The principal bus service which serves{Darras Hall}runs from{Newcastle {City Centre.}The service runs every 30 minutes,stopping at the{airport}(about 2 miles away) and the{Metro station } (5 miles). A less frequent weekday service connects{Darras Hall}with outlying villages of{Stamfordham,} {Matfen, Hexham and Morpeth.}There is a long distance service between {Newcastle and Otterburn}(25 miles) and another bus ,covering{Newcastle}to Glasgow, stops in{Ponteland. }
In our survey 25% of parents of our schoolchildrens use the bus less than 5 times a year. Only 22% use it more than 20 times per year. A high proportion of families own two cars so do not rely on public transport.
